trans-unit.source: Establishes a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized*> property for use by the .NET Framework infrastructure.
You should not implement the IXmlTextParser interface in your code.
Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
Gets or sets whether white space and attribute values are normalized.
You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and Normalized property in your code.
Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if white space attributes values are normalized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets how white space is handled when parsing XML.
You should not implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser> interface and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlTextParser.Normalized%2A> property in your code.
Instead use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Normalization%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
A member of the <xref href="System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling"></xref> enumeration that describes how whites pace is handled when parsing XML.
